posts.postText:
Hi, I am banned from GoldCraft. Can someone please tell me why, and if I can get unbanned? Thanks.



ClpGamer :D

You were banned due to: (quote) "threats, pretending to have power, falls under "respect admins" rule.".

http://nonerdsjustgeeks.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=105&t=1754

Edit: Yes, it's appealable.
